languages.text: На белоснежном пергаменте начертаны молитвы за отважных солдат династии фон Валанциус, несущих волю Вольного Торговца и Императора в Просторе Коронус.

traits.locale_text: На белоснежном пергаменте начертаны молитвы за гордые полки Имперской гвардии, несшие волю Императора в Просторе Коронус.

languages.text: Inscribed upon the snow-white parchment are prayers for the brave soldiers of House von Valancius, who carry the Rogue Trader's will and that of the Emperor across the Koronus Expanse.
languages.original_text: На белоснежном пергаменте начертаны молитвы за отважных солдат династии фон Валанциус, несущих волю Вольного Торговца и Императора в Просторе Коронус.

traits.locale_text: Inscribed upon the snow-white parchment are prayers for the brave soldiers of House von Valancius who carry the Rogue Trader's will and that of the Emperor across the Koronus Expanse.
Inscribed upon the snow-white parchment are prayers for the brave soldiers of House von Valancius who carry the Rogue Trader's will and that of the Emperor across the Koronus Expanse.

Inscribed upon the snow-white parchment are prayers for the brave soldiers of House von Valancius, who carry the Rogue Trader's will and that of the Emperor across the Koronus Expanse.

languages.text: 雪白的羊皮纸上写着献给冯·瓦兰修斯家族勇敢士兵的祷词。这些士兵负责在科罗努斯扩区贯彻行商浪人的意志与帝皇的意志。
languages.original_text: Inscribed upon the snow-white parchment are prayers for the brave soldiers of House von Valancius, who carry the Rogue Trader's will and that of the Emperor across the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 雪白的羊皮纸上写着献给冯·瓦兰修斯家族勇敢士兵的祷词。这些士兵负责在科罗努斯扩区贯彻行商浪人的意志与帝皇的意志。

languages.text: Inscritas en el blanco pergamino hay plegarias dedicadas a los valientes soldados de la casa von Valancius, que ejecutan la voluntad de su Comerciante Independiente y del Emperador en toda la Extensión de Koronus.
languages.original_text: Inscribed upon the snow-white parchment are prayers for the brave soldiers of House von Valancius, who carry the Rogue Trader's will and that of the Emperor across the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Inscritas en el blanco pergamino hay plegarias dedicadas a los valientes soldados de la casa von Valancius, que ejecutan la voluntad de su Comerciante Independiente y del Emperador en toda la Extensión de Koronus.

languages.text: 真っ白な羊皮紙には、自由開拓者の意志と皇帝の意志をコロヌス・エクスパンスを越えて届ける、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の勇敢な兵士達への祈りが刻まれている。
languages.original_text: Inscribed upon the snow-white parchment are prayers for the brave soldiers of House von Valancius, who carry the Rogue Trader's will and that of the Emperor across the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 真っ白な羊皮紙には、自由開拓者の意志と皇帝の意志をコロヌス・エクスパンスを越えて届ける、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の勇敢な兵士達への祈りが刻まれている。

languages.text: Auf dem schneeweißen Pergament sind Gebete für die tapferen Soldaten des Hauses von Valancius niedergelegt, die den Willen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und des Imperators in die Koronus-Ausdehnung hinaustragen.
languages.original_text: Inscribed upon the snow-white parchment are prayers for the brave soldiers of House von Valancius, who carry the Rogue Trader's will and that of the Emperor across the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Auf dem schneeweißen Pergament sind Gebete für die tapferen Soldaten des Hauses von Valancius niedergelegt, die den Willen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und des Imperators in die Koronus-Ausdehnung hinaustragen.

languages.text: Sur ce parchemin blanc comme neige sont inscrites des prières à destination des courageux soldats de la maison von Valancius, qui représentent la volonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et celle de l'Empereur dans les Étendues de Koronus.
languages.original_text: Inscribed upon the snow-white parchment are prayers for the brave soldiers of House von Valancius, who carry the Rogue Trader's will and that of the Emperor across the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Sur ce parchemin blanc comme neige sont inscrites des prières à destination des courageux soldats de la maison von Valancius, qui représentent la volonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et celle de l'Empereur dans les Étendues de Koronus.

languages.text: Kar beyazı parşömenlere, Hür Tacir'in ve İmparator'un iradesini Koronus Enginliği'nin dört bir yanında uygulayan yiğit von Valancius Hanesi askerleri için dualar işlenmiş.
languages.original_text: Inscribed upon the snow-white parchment are prayers for the brave soldiers of House von Valancius, who carry the Rogue Trader's will and that of the Emperor across the Koronus Expanse.
